about_the_game:
Get ready for an action-packed adventure! Take control of a hyper radical super-powered gunboat, and battle enemy drones through intense naval warfare! With stunning retro graphics, and a chaotic enemy AI, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you climb the scoreboard! Prepare for waves of enemies, and unleash your thunder! Battle across multiple environments including open ocean, coastal areas and even river delta. Download now and experience the thrill of being a gunboat commander!

Dive into battle with Retro Wave Thunder!
Use 4 of your powerful weapons to take the drones out for good!
Fun and frantic retro gameplay!
Designed for the Steam Deck and custom arcade cabinets!
  • 4 Radically Super Weapons
  • 5 Totally Twisted Bosses
  • 6 Bodacious Backgrounds
  • 7 Wickedly Evil Enemies
  • Local Scoreboards
  • Old School Graphics and Endless Gameplay

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 2.0 / Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible, 512 MB video memory, framebuffer object support. E.g. Intel HD 4600 or better.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
